name: Destiny: Dungeon Conquerors
description:
Destiny: Dungeon Conquerors is an ARPG featuring generated dungeon layouts and various challenges. It is based on my other game prototype:   https://stdio.itch.io/destproto

This game is also a prototype. I am not sure if I am going to continue it.    However, feedback is appreciated.

There is local-coop support but it is buggy.  Also important to note is that menus do not completely support a controller. You'll have to use your mouse to interact with menus.    I'm interested in porting it to Android but the performance is currently an issue.

Game size is currently  ~1.13GB. Download size is ~1.04GB.

Important Credits:

Characters -  Vroid Studio
